name: Health & Wellness Program
description: The Bayview Senior Services Health & Wellness team implements programs, activities, and events intended to enhance the overall well-being of senior and disabled community members. Programs and activities: - Health screens (COVID, Blood Pressure, Cholesterol, Glucose Prostate) - Flu & COVID vaccines - Brain Health Information Series - Tai Chi - Chair Yoga - Strength Training - Bowling - Nature walks - Line Dance The Market distributes donated or discounted food and other supplies related to cooki
